title: Gingerbread men
ingredients: ['350g (12 oz) treacle', '225g (8 oz) dark brown soft sugar', '150ml (5 fl oz) cold water', '50g (2 oz) butter', '900g (2 lb) plain flour', '1 dessertspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground allspice', '1 dessertspoon ground ginger', '1 teaspoon ground cloves', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon']
